item.title: Highlights of Amazon's New Simple Email Service (SES)
item.description: The five adjectives that can be used to describe Amazon's new Simple Email Service (SES) are: simple, reliable, affordable, compatible, and scalable. While this email service is new, it promises to put positive aspects back into email marketing.

item.title: Subversion usage in ASP.NET Project Code Control
item.description: Apache Subversion (commonly known as SVN, due to command line program name svn) is and revision control and software versioning system This is open source software. Developers use Subversion to keep current and history of source code files, web pages, and software documentation. Apache Subversion is mostly-compatible with its predecessor which is also wide spread, Concurrent Versions System. Subversion was developed by CollabNet Inc. ...
